clinical_study.brief_title: Extension Study for Patients Who Have Participated in a BMN 701 Study
clinical_study.official_title: A Long-Term Study for Extended BMN 701 Treatment of Patients With Pompe Disease Who Have Participated in a BMN 701 Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 2 open-label, multiple dose study of BMN 701 administered by IV infusion every 2 weeks (qow) to patients with late-onset Pompe disease.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean distance walked as measured by the Six-minute Walk Test (6MWT)
